typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		name as string,
		dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> emp
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> dept
emp, dept join(dept == Column_1,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(uppername = upper(name)) ~> uppercolumn
uppercolumn filter(name!="sai") ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(input(
		name as string,
		dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['final.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		name = uppername,
		dept,
		deptname = Column_2
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
